snippet: Improved demand for business products lifted results for the maker of computer networking equipment.
abstract: Sales for collaboration and Internet video products help Cisco's better-than-expected results; second fiscal quarter profit is $2.2 billion, or 40 cents a share, up 43.5 percent from year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: Improved demand for business products lifted results for the maker of computer networking equipment.

headline.main: Cuts Help Cisco Beat Analysts’ Expectations
headline.print_headline: Cuts Help Cisco Beat Analysts’ Expectations
